Name: WHOIdentifierTypes
Title: WHO Identifier Types
Description: The identifier types code system defines codes for identifier types used throughout WHO content.

Name: ANCActivityCodes
Title: ANC Activity Codes
Description: Activity codes are codes to identify the types of activities that are performed as part of the delivery of antenatal care

Name: ANCCareCodes
Title: ANC Care Codes
Description: Care codes are high-level codes used to identify types and categories of care for use in encounters, episodes, and care categories throughout Antenatal care guideline computable content.

Name: anccustomcodes
Title: Extended Codes CodeSystem
Description: Set of codes representing all concepts used in the implementation guide

Name: ANCPersona
Title: ANC Personas
Description: A persona is a depiction of a relevant stakeholder, or “end-user”, of the system. Although the specific roles and demographic profile of the personas will vary depending on the setting, the generic personas are based on the WHO core competencies and credentials of different health worker personas. Please note that these are developed based on synthesis across multiple contexts as a starting point, and further contextualization will be required according to the needs, motivations and challenges of the targeted personas in each setting.
